channel.title: [RSCD] Error when editing CommandHandler.java
channel.description:
Whenever I edit the CommandHandler.java file (to add a command) I run the compile.bat file, then when I runserver/runlserver it gives me an exception (and I know I editing the file correctly and there are no errors).
When cmd gives me when I use the run_server file: [code]Buildfile: build.xml
runserver: [java] RSCD Server starting up... [java] Attempting to connect to LS [java] Registering world (30) with LS [java] [java] <-- Loading Quest class files --> [java] [java] - Loaded: testquest [java] [java] <-- 1 Quest class files loaded --> [java] [java] GameEngine now running [java] java.lang.Exception: Error registering world [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.LoginConnector.setRegistered(LoginConnector.java:128) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.packetbuilder.loginserver.MiscPacketBuilder$1.handlePacket(MiscPacketBuilder.java:57) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.LoginConnector.processIncomingPackets(LoginConnector.java:160) [java] RSCD Server shutting down... [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.processLoginServer(GameEngine.java:104) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:80) [java] Unregistering world (30) with LS [/code]
HELP!

item.title: [RSCD] Error when editing CommandHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @Sworddude247 Sworddude247
item.description:
@Sworddude247 wrote:

I fixed this Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] Error when editing CommandHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

The error you’ve pasted suggests that there is a problem communicating with the login server. Are you sure the login server is running, are you getting any output from it?

Also, sounds like one or more of your other class files has changed if you’re still having problems after reverting the one file.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] Error when editing CommandHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @Sworddude247 Sworddude247
item.description:
@Sworddude247 wrote:

The error in the run_server file only occurs when I edit the file. Everything then must be corrupted because when I change back the CommandHandler file it still happens to I have to restore everything to default.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] Error when editing CommandHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @henry henry
item.description:
@henry wrote:

Ok… so first off, you’re posting your run_server log… that doesn’t show compile errors…

The server isn’t running for some reason because of something that has to do with starting up the server, I don’t have a copy of that source so I couldn’t tell you exactly how they are doing it.

If you were to post your compile log then maybe somebody could actually help you with your compiling error.

Read full topic

@Sworddude247 wrote:

Whenever I edit the CommandHandler.java file (to add a command) I run the compile.bat file, then when I runserver/runlserver it gives me an exception (and I know I editing the file correctly and there are no errors).
